record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business until 4 p.m., with the time equally divided between the two leaders or their designees, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum and ask unanimous consent that the time in the quorum call be divided equally between the Democrats and the Republicans.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
